summary: Talah is a petite Redguard Vampire located within Markarth at the Silver-Blood Inn. She is available in four versions; Auto-Level from 10 to 80 or a Calculated Level 45, Essential or Non-Essential. She has a short story that tells how she became a vampire with accompanying image links below each page. Added Redguard and Redguard Vampire Race option
descriptionHtml:

[b][center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-4-1344151598.jpg] Click to see Image 9[/url][/center][/b]

[b][size= 5][color= BlueViolet]Required:[/b][/size][/color] 
[b][size= 5][color= RED][font= century gothic] 
Latest version of ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/76734 
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1344622323.jpg[/img]
Use the direct link above for manual install or go to Appachii\'s page to use NMM option. This is a standalone file she just added and it is located below the main file in optional files. This mod is NOT Apachii 1.4!!! If you don\'t use this file she will be bald and or \"wonky\"!!! Thanks! :)[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[b][size= 5][color= BlueViolet]Personal Stats:[/b][/size][/color] 
[b][size= 4][color= BLACK][font= century gothic]
Race: Redguard Vampire or Optional Redguard Human
Voice: Female Young Eager
Hair: Blue Black
Eyes: Brown
Age: 19
Location: Markark, Silver-Blood Inn
Weight: 50% at the scale. If you use ADEC, UNPB or CBBE bodies with BBP she should be okay.
Height: 4\'10\" to 5\'0\" 
Inventory: She is equipped with one Iron Dagger and Pocket Loot. She is nude without armor so you can outfit her with whatever you wish 
Combat: A mix of Vampire One Handed and Combat Necromage
Properties: She is available non-essential or essential and is marriageable.[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[b][size= 5][color= BlueViolet]Optional Files:[/b][/size][/color] 

[b][color= black][size= 4][font= century gothic]To make her look like she does in my images; 
I used Bella\'s Better Females Main file then overwrote it with Makeup variant 1 and finally Bella\'s No Shine.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Darker Neater Brows by Caliente
Dirt to Beauty Marks by Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot for the best damn dark brown eyes on the Nexus! (IMHO)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

Her body in my images is CBBEv3 main body with Navetseas CBBE 1.8 body \"Toned Abs and Feminine Arms\"; and some images show her used with \"Glossy Skin for all female bodymod - v05 - No Gloss\" textures (removes sheen from her skin if you like that look). (She can be used with whatever body you prefer but she is petite so don\'t expect a Hooters girl) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5437

She is wearing Caliente\'s Vanilla Clothing for CBBE in a few of her screenies and black robes by
a little sexy apparel replacer - for CBBE - by Cotyounoyume
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5564

Bobs Armory Skyrim by Mr Dave provided the Ruby Jeweled Dagger
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12060

Expanded Jewelry Crafting by lautasantenni
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8361[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[b][size= 4][color= BlueViolet]Note: Since she is created using the NPC Editor I painstakingly removed each and every extra Apachii hair file from her. There should be no extra hairs in the \"showracemenu\" with this mod in use.[/b][/size][/color]

[B][COLOR=BlueViolet][font= century gothic][size= 4]***Remember to use ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0!!!***[/size][/B][/COLOR][/font] 

[b][size= 6]Thanks for checking out my mod and please endorse her if you like her! :) 

Warm regards,

FB[/b][/size]
author: FalmerBane

files.name: Talah Auto-Level Essential Version
files.changelogHtml:
Initial Release
I added a non-vampire race option for those with the Dawnguard Vamp Face Bug, also can be infected by any vampire mod
